Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{3: "At dawn's first light in the late spring, the silent forest awakens to an echoing chorus of birdsong that breathes life into every creature nearby."}
{3: "Even though this natural alarm clock stirs you from sleep, you can't resist the urge to sleep a little longer, given the situation."}
{2: 'Something smells nice...', 3: '8'}
{3: 'The scent of food is what really makes you want to get moving.'}
{3: 'Right before you step out of the room, you hear a faint noise.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying walks out of the kitchen, carrying a steaming basket of breakfast.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Did you sleep well last night?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "As you take in this scene, you can't help but wonder if you're still caught in a dream."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Looks like you're still waking up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It just feels... so unreal.', 3: '22'}
{3: 'You manage an awkward smile, your eyes automatically drifting to the food on the table.'}
{3: "Aside from a few baskets of breakfast, you're surprised to see three wooden bowls laid out."}
{3: 'In that moment, you notice a cautious gaze watching you from behind the kitchen door.'}
{3: "The gaze belongs to a child, and yet there's no real fear in those eyes—only a faint numbness."}
{3: 'Both Hanying and you look toward the door. She places the breakfast on the table, then hurries over to you.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'My apologies. I should have explained everything to you yesterday. This child...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying deliberately lowers her voice.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Her name is Yalin. Her parents were wandering around nearby. By the time I came across them, they were already... taken by the Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Before they... passed away, they asked us to look after their child.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying explains it quietly—this sort of tragedy is all too common in the search for a new home.'}
{3: "You're back to feeling steady now, your mind fully clear."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yalin, this is a commandant from Babylonia, my...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Friend.', 3: '42', 4: 'Sworn brother.', 5: '43', 6: 'Sworn sister.', 7: '44'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Close friend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Sworn brother.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Sworn sister.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying signs her explanation to Yalin again.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Encouraged by Hanying's calming tone, the girl slowly steps out from behind the door, still a bit nervous."}
{3: 'The atmosphere is still a little tense, but you smile warmly, hoping she picks up on your friendliness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Her vocal cords were injured...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "She's living with a kind-hearted family right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "She's not quite like the other kids in the settlement, still a bit afraid of the mechanoids from the Church of Machina...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But she can't really avoid them entirely there, so she's been spending a lot of time here with me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Oh, by the way, if you want to show we're closer... Commandant, please step in a bit more.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying quietly pleads with you, so you both shuffle closer. You give Yalin a small wave.'}
{3: "But she stays put by the door, keeping the mood on edge. Then, just when things couldn't get any more awkward, a loud growl rumbles through the air."}
{3: "You are pretty sure that noise isn't coming from you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Then, shall we eat before the food gets cold?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Yalin avoids your gaze, her eyes flicking around like she's waging an internal war. At last, she steels herself and joins you at the table."}
{3: 'All three of you grab your chopsticks at the same time.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I ain't agreeing to this. Do you even know what all this means?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I do. I've collected a good amount of data about Kowloong architecture just to be here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Well then nobody's demolishing this place on the Bixi Crew's watch!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'We brought the heavy-duty equipment here, and Kowloong funded it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dazhu slams the blueprint onto the table.'}
{3: "He can't see any sign of emotion on the mechanoid's face, and that flat, unfeeling tone just makes him even angrier."}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "If we go with your approach, we won't wrap up this entire project until at least fall.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "That's going to put us behind by more than a month. And if we have to build extra temporary housing for new arrivals, the schedule's only going to slip further.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "This right here is Kowloong's legacy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I ain't let it get wrecked on my watch, unless there's no other choice.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Dazhu decides he's had enough of squabbling with the mechanoid. He sighs and heads out of the tent."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg'}
{3: "That's when he picks up the sound of a conversation coming from nearby."}
{3: 'The voices get louder, and the people eventually meet the Bixi Crew member and the mechanoid.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: '...Boccioni and Dazhu, our reinforcement sent by the Bixi Crew, are going to restore this old site.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{3: 'You just wrapped up a quick walkthrough of this abandoned complex with Hanying.'}
{3: 'Time has erased all traces of its name. The archway was wrecked ages ago and has been reduced to nothing but rotten wood scraps.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory557.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The houses hug the gentle hillside, creating a tiered complex that feels like a quaint town climbing upward.'}
{3: 'Until the restoration is complete, any new settlers have to make do with a temporary camp at the foot of the hill.'}
{3: "Time has smoothed over the marks of past calamities, and as you stroll along the path, it's easy to imagine how bustling this place once was decades ago."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory557.jpg'}
{3: "Right now, you're looking at a thriving stand of sycamore trees that takes the place of the busy throng you picture in your mind."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory559.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'A broad clearing near the summit stands empty, akin to a central plaza. A few derelict buildings remain, with trees poking through crumbling walls.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory559.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'A gruff voice snaps you out of your thoughts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I can't get through to that guy at all! I used to think working with a mechanoid would be easier.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'From the way this Bixi Crew member talks and carries himself, you realize this must be the "Dazhu" Hanying was telling you about.'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '121'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'Hanying, um...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Oh right, 【kuroname】. You're the Gray Raven Commandant, yeah? Sorry about my outburst earlier. Just call me Dazhu.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Dazhu clears his throat and, looking a bit embarrassed, stretches out his hand. You take it in a quick, polite handshake.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is something bothering you, Dazhu?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I'm having a bit of a disagreement with him.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg'}
{3: 'Dazhu notices Boccioni trailing behind him and exhales a heavy sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A disagreement...?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That doesn't sound good at all.", 3: '136'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Let's not make a big deal out of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "The mechanoid insists we have to demolish all these buildings and start fresh. I ain't on board with that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Dazhu insists on preserving them, even though restoration costs much more time and money than starting over.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I'm suggesting it as a professional architect.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Kowloong's old buildings are nearly all gone! They're precious relics of our heritage!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'Hanying, surely you understand what I mean.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the tension build, you quickly step in before things go too far.'}
{2: 'Dazhu has a valid point.', 3: '148', 4: "Boccioni's conclusion makes sense.", 5: '148'}
{2: 'But we should still base our judgment on a thorough investigation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I completely understand your concerns, Dazhu...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But Commandant is right. We do need some solid evidence for this sort of thing.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'We just got here! How are we supposed to have any proper calculations already?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'We have inspected more than half the houses, and it turns out none of them are salvageable.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I know you're giving me an out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "But I don't trust those mechanoids. Let's wait until we Bixi folks can take a look for ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the tension eases, Dazhu takes a look around.'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "No matter what, we can't just sit here doing nothing. Weeds and trees get in the way of rebuilding, and that's something we can tackle right now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Boccioni tilts his head to look at Dazhu.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Besides firewood, we're also short on fences and guardrails. That's a really constructive idea.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I'll make sure it goes into next week's schedule.", 4: '22'}
{3: 'The tension eases. Neither the Bixi Crew member nor the mechanoid says anything more as they head back to work.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory559.jpg'}
{3: 'You find yourself wandering deeper into the complex with Hanying, almost without realizing it.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying seems distracted, and you silently observe the old houses around you, lush with greenery.'}
{2: 'Still thinking about what happened earlier?', 3: '173'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...There's no hiding anything from you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Even family members who live together have their share of arguments, let alone those working together for the first time...', 4: '1'}
{2: "So there's really nothing for you to worry about, Hanying.", 3: '176'}
{3: 'Hanying shakes her head.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's just that I've never been good at making decisions for both sides of an argument.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's why I need to learn from you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's also taken me a long time to figure it out, actually.", 3: '182', 4: "To be honest, I don't really like handling these kinds of situations either.", 5: '182'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you feel something nudge the tip of your shoe.'}
{3: 'A pinecone rolls forward from under your foot. Hanying quickly goes after it and picks it up.'}
{3: 'You both look up as a warm breeze drifts past, and the pine trees stir with a gentle rustling—like a quiet whisper carrying emotions no one can fully grasp.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'It probably fell from one of the trees here, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gently runs her fingers over its shell, examining every detail.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This is their "continuation."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Should we plant it somewhere else?', 4: '1'}
